stimulusHtml: How many times is the statement in line 17 of the method executed as a result of the call  selectionSort(arr)?

features.html:
Consider the following correct implementation of the selection sort algorithm.

 

public static void selectionSort(int[] elements)
{
   for (int j = 0; j < elements.length - 1; j++)
   {
      int minIndex = j;
      for (int k = j + 1; k < elements.length; k++)
      {
         if (elements[k] < elements[minIndex])
         {
            minIndex = k;
         }
      }
      if (j != minIndex)
      {
         int temp = elements[j];
         elements[j] = elements[minIndex];
         elements[minIndex] = temp;         // Line 17
      }
   }
}

 

The following declaration and method call appear in a method in the same class as  selectionSort.

 

int[] arr = {9, 8, 7, 6, 5}; 
selectionSort(arr);
